subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Barry Melrose, Tampa Bay’s first-year head coach, has sparked his team after a listless 1-3-3 start in which the Lightning scored a league-low 11 goals.
snippet: Barry Melrose, Tampa Bay’s first-year head coach, has sparked his team after a listless 1-3-3 start in which the Lightning scored a league-low 11 goals.
